description.value:
Weapon (dart), common
When you hit a Large or smaller creature with an attack using this colorful magic dart, the target is splattered with magical paint, which outlines the target in a dim glow (your choice of color) for 1 minute. Any attack roll against a creature outlined in the glow has advantage if the attacker can see the creature, and the creature canâ€™t benefit from being invisible. The creature outlined in the glow can end the effect early by using an action to wipe off the splatter of paint.
